SEARCH
Package operation

Class BookingDetails

java.lang.Object
operation.BookingDetails
All Implemented Interfaces:
loadInfo<BookingDetails>
public class BookingDetails extends Object implements loadInfo<BookingDetails>
Manages detailed information about bookings including loading, adding, and retrieving bookings. Implements the loadInfo interface to load booking details from a file.

  • Method Details

    • getBookings

      public List<Booking> getBookings()
      Retrieves the list of all bookings managed by this instance.
      Returns:
      A list of bookings.

    • setBookings

      public void setBookings(List<Booking> bookings)
      Sets the list of bookings managed by this instance.
      Parameters:
      bookings - The list of Booking objects to be managed.

    • loadInfo

      public BookingDetails loadInfo(List<String> lines, String fileName) throws IOException, InvalidLineException, FileNotFoundException, InvalidFormatException
      Loads booking details from a specified file and returns an instance of BookingDetails populated with bookings. It parses the file line by line to create Booking objects and adds them to the BookingDetails instance.
      Specified by:
      loadInfo in interface loadInfo<BookingDetails>
      Parameters:
      lines - A list of strings where each string represents a line in the file being processed.
      fileName - The name of the file from which booking data is being loaded.
      Returns:
      A BookingDetails object containing all bookings loaded from the file.

    • loadCustomerBookingDetails

      public BookingDetails loadCustomerBookingDetails(String customerID, BookingDetails bookingDetails)
      Retrieves all bookings for a specified customer from the provided BookingDetails.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The customer identifier for which bookings are to be retrieved.
      bookingDetails - The BookingDetails from which to extract customer-specific bookings.
      Returns:
      A BookingDetails instance containing only the bookings for the specified customer.

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(Booking booking, String bookingPath, String customerID, String concertID) throws FileNotFoundException
      Adds a new booking to the existing list of bookings and saves it to a file.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking to be added.
      bookingPath - The file path where the booking should be saved.
      customerID - The customer ID associated with the booking.
      concertID - The concert ID associated with the booking.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the file specified by bookingPath cannot be found.
      FileNotFoundException
